title: Prologue to a Supposed Play - speaker indicates

content.question: The speaker indicates that the play will include

choices.label: discussions of subjects unfamiliar to the audience
mockery of characters similar to the audience
celebration of the audienceâ€™s desire to be reassured

content.answer: mockery of characters similar to the audience

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
